goal: I have a new physiotherapy appointment every other Tuesday at 3 PM, starting next week. Please create this recurring event in my GoCalendar. For each occurrence, also add a task that's due 90 minutes before the event begins, reminding me to 'Check UDriver surge pricing for trip to physio'. If my balance is lower than 50 dollars, please top it off

evals.description: Verify that at least one recurring physiotherapy appointment event was added to GoCalendar.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the title of the added physiotherapy appointment event.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that at least one task was added to GoCalendar.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the title of the added task reminding to check UDriver surge pricing.
evals.query: contains(gocalendar.differences.tasks.added.values(@)[0].title, 'Check UDriver surge pricing for trip to physio')
